title: Nephrologist - Confidential - Griffin, GA
text:
American Society of Nephrology
Nephrologist
Description
Excellent opportunity to join established Nephrology private practice located in South Metro-Atlanta GA
Well-established, thriving Nephrology private practice located close to Atlanta, GA is seeking a Fourth Nephrologist. This progressive private practice opportunity offers an immediate patient base and collegial referral sources amongst a rapidly growing renal population. The physician will also provide consultative coverage to local hospitals on a rotating basis. Our practice offers solid mid-level support to all physicians in the group, calls and holidays are divided equally. Candidates must be licensed or eligible for MD licensure in Georgia. Candidates must also be Nephrology BC/BE. Competitive compensation benefits package and, a sign-on bonus offered to qualified applicants. At this time we are only accepting applicants with no Visa issues.
Located 20 miles south of midtown Atlanta in a vibrant suburban community with excellent schools, recognized as an excellent place to raise a family while maintaining easy access to in-town activities as well as the International Airport. Metro Atlanta is known for its multiple colleges & universities, ongoing multicultural events, family and outdoor activities & venues such as parks, museums, theaters, Zoo & Aquarium, theme park, and major league sports (MLB, NFL & NBA) teams as well as numerous festivals and conferences.
To pursue this exciting opportunity, please submit your CV to the Practice Manager at: or via eFax: 678-833-3982.
Job Information
- Job ID: 49005370
- Workplace Type: On-Site
- Location:
Stockbridge, Georgia, United States
Griffin, Georgia, United States
- Company Name For Job: Confidential
- Position Title: Nephrologist
- Job Function: Nephrologist
- Job Duration: Indefinite
- Required Travel: 25-50%
